org.kepler.configuration

Class ConfigurationUtilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.configuration.ConfigurationUtilities

  • public class ConfigurationUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of utilities to manage configuration properties.
    Author:
    Daniel Crawl

    • Method Detail

      • getPairsMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getPairsMap(ConfigurationProperty property)
        Return a map from a list of name value pairs contained in a property. This returns pairs any any depth of the property.

      • getPairsMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getPairsMap(ConfigurationProperty property,
                                                                           boolean recurse)
        Return a map of name value pairs contained in a property.
        Parameters:
        property - the property
        recurse - if true, look at all depths in the property for pairs. if false, only return pairs from the top level.

      • getMultiValuePairsMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getMultiValuePairsMap(ConfigurationProperty property)
        Get a map of name value pairs in the property where each key can have multiple values.

      • copyAllProperties

        public static void copyAllProperties(java.lang.String namespaceStr,
                                     java.lang.String destModuleName,
                                     java.lang.String srcModuleName)
        Copy all the properties in a namespace from one module to another. NOTE: the changes to the destination are not saved.

      • copyProperties

        public static void copyProperties(java.lang.String destModuleName,
                                  java.lang.String srcModuleName,
                                  java.lang.String destPropertyName,
                                  java.lang.String srcPropertyNames)
        Copy a property or set of properties from one module to another using the default namespace. NOTE: the changes to the destination are not saved.
        Parameters:
        destModuleName - name of destination module
        srcModuleName - name of source module
        destPropertyName - name of destination property
        srcPropertyName - name of property or properties in source module to copy. Can use "a.b.c" format to denote a nested name.

      • copyProperties

        public static void copyProperties(java.lang.String namespaceStr,
                                  java.lang.String destModuleName,
                                  java.lang.String srcModuleName,
                                  java.lang.String destPropertyName,
                                  java.lang.String srcPropertyNames,
                                  boolean setDirty)
        Copy a property or set of properties from one module to another for a specific namespace.
        Parameters:
        namespaceStr - the namespace
        destModuleName - name of destination module
        srcModuleName - name of source module
        destPropertyName - name of destination property
        srcPropertyName - name of property or properties in source module to copy. Can use "a.b.c" format to denote a nested name.
        setDirty - If true, set the destination property dirty so that it will be saved.

      • copyPropertiesToIndices

        public static void copyPropertiesToIndices(java.lang.String namespaceStr,
                                           java.lang.String destModuleName,
                                           java.lang.String srcModuleName,
                                           java.lang.String destPropertyName,
                                           java.lang.String srcPropertyNames,
                                           java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> indices)
                                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Copy a property or set of properties from one module to specific top level indices of another for a specific namespace.
        Parameters:
        namespaceStr - the namespace
        destModuleName - name of destination module
        srcModuleName - name of source module
        destPropertyName - name of destination property
        srcPropertyName - name of property or properties in source module to copy. Can use "a.b.c" format to denote a nested name.
        indices - top level destination indices where properties will be placed
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
